raw_infobox.name: Russell Westbrook
raw_infobox.caption: Westbrook with the Los Angeles Lakers in 2022
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA Most Valuable Player (2016)
* 9× NBA All-Star (2011–2013, 2015–2020)
* 2× NBA All-Star Game MVP (2015, 2016)
* 2× All-NBA First Team (2015, 2016)
* 5× All-NBA Second Team (2010–2012, 2014, 2017)
* 2× All-NBA Third Team (2018, 2019)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2008)
* 2× List of NBA annual scoring leaders (2014, 2016)
* 3× List of NBA annual assists leaders (2017, 2018, 2020)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* Third-team List of All-Pac-12 Conference men's basketball teams (2008)
* Pac-12 Conference Men's Basketball Defensive Player of the Year (2008)
* Pac-10 All-Defensive Team (2008)
